EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addPhase(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Add a new phase. Only owner can add.

buy().notice: Buy tokens in current phase. Excess ETH will be queued for withdrawal via `withdrawPayments`.

calculateTokens(uint256).notice: Calculate tokens + cost + excess if buying `ethAmount` in current phase (safe, non-reverting)

claim().notice: Claim minted tokens after sale ended and soft cap reached

constructor.notice: Constructor sets token, decimals and initial sale params NOTE: Ownable requires an initial owner parameter in OZ v5, por eso pasamos msg.sender.

escrowBalance().notice: Returns the total escrowed ETH reserved for buyer withdrawals

getCurrentPhase().notice: Reverting current phase getter (keeps backward compatibility)

hasActivePhase().notice: Returns whether there is an active phase

pausePhase(uint256).notice: Pause a specific phase by setting its end time to now (emergency)

paymentsOf(address).notice: View pending payments for an account

remainingTokensInCurrentPhase().notice: Remaining tokens in current phase (0 if none)

requestRefund().notice: Request refund when sale ended and soft cap not reached

updatePhase(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Update phase times for a future (not-yet-started) phase

withdrawProceeds(address).notice: Withdraw proceeds (ETH held in contract) to beneficiary. Only owner and only when softCapReached and saleEnded.

userdoc.notice: Handles multi-phase presale, buy, claim, refund, and withdraw logic
